Rob Schwartz

Developer

Anthony Nicalo, CEO

Anthony is a serial entrepreneur, AMA-recognized marketing expert and alumnus of the University of Michigan. A former Michelin chef, his passion for helping consumers understand the origins of their food led him to working with Certified Humane. Their partnership formed the very first Dónde locator.

Fabien Allanic, CTO

Fabien is a recognized expert in Javascript and has over 11 years of development experience. He met Anthony while he was working with Certified Humane, and created the first Dónde locator. Fabien is an advisor to EchoJS and continues to work in Android and open-source development in his spare time.
